official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Secretary of the Army from imposing
		  excessive fees for the use of Army-controlled real property at water resources
		  development projects with respect to concessionaires operating facilities
		  making restaurant, gasoline, or marine engine sales at marinas, and for other
		  purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Marina Operator Tax Obligation Relief Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Leases for
			 facilities making restaurant, gasoline, and marine engine sales at
			 marinas

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not impose a fee under a lease entered into with
			 a concessionaire for the use of Army-controlled real property (and the
			 facilities thereon) at a water resources development project if—

text.#text:
Beginning 1 year after the date of enactment of this Act,
			 the

the lease is for
			 the operation of a facility making restaurant, gasoline, or marine engine sales
			 in connection with a marina; and

the amount of the
			 fee exceeds 1 percent of the gross revenues of the facility.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall modify leases entered into
			 before the date of enactment of this Act as necessary to comply with the
			 requirements of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Marina Operator Tax Obligation Relief Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2795 IH: Marina Operator Tax Obligation Relief Act of 2013
